alert.note: Alert for Bulloch; Coastal Chatham; Effingham; Inland Bryan; Inland Chatham; Inland Liberty (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 7:48PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF BRYAN, LIBERTY, BULLOCH, EFFINGHAM AND CHATHAM COUNTIES... At 747 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bay to near McIntosh, and moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...excessive cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...All outdoor activities should cease. Move indoors immediately. Some locations in the path of these storms include... Pooler, Richmond Hill, Pembroke, Savannah International Airport, I-16/I-95 Interchange, Hunter Army Airfield, Godley Station, and Coffee Bluff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<45 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to flooding of low lying and poor drainage areas. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Excessive cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 15 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Bulloch; Coastal Chatham; Effingham; Inland Bryan; Inland Chatham; Inland Liberty
